thread.title: 'Orange is the New Black' Season Five Will Take Place Over Just Three Days!
thread.title_full: 'Orange is the New Black' Season Five Will Take Place Over Just Three Days!

author: Just Jared
title: 'Orange is the New Black' Season Five Will Take Place Over Just Three Days!
text:
Danielle Brooks gave up some major scoop on the upcoming season of Orange is the New Black !
The 27-year-old actress dished to reporters on the red carpet at the 2017 Screen Actors Guild Awards on Sunday (January 29) in Los Angeles.
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Danielle Brooks 
Danielle said that season five of the hit Netflix show will take place over three days!
Yes, that’s right. The entire season of 13 episodes will span just 72 hours. 
Orange is the New Black ‘s season five will hit Netflix sometime this year.
MORE OITNB: Taryn Manning Did Not Quit Orange is the New Black
